meanings.definition: Showing contempt or scorn through a facial expression or tone of voice.
meanings.sent1: Her sneery look made me feel small.
meanings.sent2: The bully's sneery comments hurt others' feelings.
meanings.sent3: He tried to hide his sneery grin during the serious meeting.
meanings.sent4: The politician's sneery tone turned off many voters.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's sneery gaze silenced the noisy classroom.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a sneer or mocking attitude.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's sneery jokes made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand his sneery behavior towards others.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave a sneery look at the dog's failed attempt to catch a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The movie portrayed the villain with a sneery smile.
meanings.sent5: The sneery attitude of the team captain affected the whole group negatively.
